title: I have unusual high ping lately. What do I do?
body:
So in the last few days I could barely play any League game beause of the high ping. At the start it's around 40 ms but during the game it goes up to 500 ms or even 1000 ms and then I get disconnected. I have to go afk almost every time I play because of this. 
I've run the internet speed test and the ping was good so I guess the problem is with League. Has this happened to anyone else here? What should I do?

replies.body: It sounds like you might be suffering from packet loss or some connection problem that's failing keep strong comms with the game server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of what's going on.  You'll also find some troubleshooting steps with those results.  Let me know what you find!
